rule: The output must not contain any elements of the joke itself or any references to the content of the joke.
input: Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field.
validityText:
The given input is a joke presented in text format. It consists of a setup ("Why did the scarecrow win an award?") and a punchline ("Because he was outstanding in his field."), forming a classic example of a pun. The joke adheres to the input specifications, which state that the input must simply be a joke in text form. There are no restrictions on the length or type of content, and this input clearly represents a form of humor.

No violation.
OK
